main_definition: Tiger is an idiom used to describe someone who displays qualities of strength, ferocity, aggression or dominance.

meanings_and_examples.example: The team's performance was a real tiger, they showed incredible resilience.
He got into an argument with his boss that turned ugly - he really let out his inner tiger.
The CEO had a firm grip on the company, his decisions were always final; he was truly a business-tiger.
